      • getByte

        public byte getByte(java.lang.String name)

        Gets a byte from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type BYTE

        If the length of the data stored at the specified name is larger than 1, returns only the first value

        Use getBytes to get all values

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The byte stored

      • getBool

        public boolean getBool(java.lang.String name)

        Gets a boolean from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type BOOL

        If the length of the data stored at the specified name is larger than 1, returns only the first value

        Use getBools to get all values

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The boolean stored

      • getBools

        public boolean[] getBools(java.lang.String name)

        Gets a boolean[] from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type BOOL OR BOOLS_8

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The boolean[] stored

      • getInt

        public int getInt(java.lang.String name)

        Gets a signed integer from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type INT_8BIT OR INT_16BIT OR INT_24BIT OR INT_32BIT

        If the length of the data stored at the specified name is larger than 1, returns only the first value

        There currently does not exist a function to get multiple integer values

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The signed integer stored

      • getUint

        public int getUint(java.lang.String name)

        Gets an unsigned integer from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type UINT_8BIT OR UINT_16BIT OR UINT_24BIT

        If the length of the data stored at the specified name is larger than 1, returns only the first value

        There currently does not exist a function to get multiple integer values

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The unsigned integer stored

      • getChar

        public char getChar(java.lang.String name)

        Gets a char from the file with the specified name

        Data must be of type CHAR_ASCII OR CHAR_UNICODE

        If the length of the data stored at the specified name is larger than 1, returns only the first value

        Use getString to get all values

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        Returns:
        The char stored

      • storeBools

        public void storeBools(java.lang.String name,
                       boolean[] data)

        Stores a boolean[] in the file at the specified name

        Data must be of type BOOL OR BOOLS_8

        If Data is of type DataType.BOOLS_8, the array's size must be a multiple of 8

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data
        data - The boolean[] to store
